We are working on a new implementation of the pipe for the next magrittr release. It:

1) has cleaner backtraces
2) is much faster
3) works lazily

Our analysis and testing suggest it should be a drop in replacement for >99.9% of code but we need your help testing it! #rstats https://t.co/2fVFvttsZD
